mapper.select: select level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from goods2_category start with cateCodeRef is null connect by prior cateCode = cateCodeRef
mapper.insert: insert into tbl2_goods (gdsNum, gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsThumbImg) values (tbl2_goods_seq.nextval, #{gdsName}, #{cateCode}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsStock}, #{gdsDes}, #{gdsImg},#{gdsThumbImg})
mapper.select: select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg from tbl2_goods g inner join goods2_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode
